query.value: CASE WHEN !@PLUSPCUSTOMER IS NOT NULL AND !@PLUSPCUSTOMER = 'HLC-00' then 'HLAG' WHEN !@PLUSPCUSTOMER IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(!@PLUSPCUSTOMER) >= 3 THEN SUBSTR(!@PLUSPCUSTOMER, LENGTH(!@PLUSPCUSTOMER) - 2, 3) ELSE '' END
CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@AFFECTEDPERSON) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(!@AFFECTEDPERSON,1,LOCATE('@',!@AFFECTEDPERSON)-1) ELSE !@AFFECTEDPERSON END
CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@CREATEBY) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(!@CREATEBY,1,LOCATE('@',!@CREATEBY)-1) ELSE !@CREATEBY END
CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@REPORTEDBY) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(!@REPORTEDBY,1,LOCATE('@',!@REPORTEDBY)-1) ELSE !@REPORTEDBY END
CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@OWNER) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(!@OWNER,1,LOCATE('@',!@OWNER)-1) ELSE !@OWNER END

CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@PERSONID) > 0 THEN '(' || SUBSTR(!@PERSONID,1,LOCATE('@',!@PERSONID)-1) || ') ' || COALESCE(!@DISPLAYNAME,'-- Name Not Set --') ELSE '(' || !@PERSONID || ') ' || COALESCE(!@DISPLAYNAME,'-- Name Not Set --') END
CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@PERSONID) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(!@PERSONID,1,LOCATE('@',!@PERSONID)-1) ELSE !@PERSONID END
CASE WHEN LOCATE('@',!@RESPPARTYGROUP) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(!@RESPPARTYGROUP,1,LOCATE('@',!@RESPPARTYGROUP)-1) ELSE !@RESPPARTYGROUP END

attribute.name: hlagpluspcustomer
attribute.query: CASE WHEN !@CUSTOMER IS NOT NULL AND !@CUSTOMER = 'HLC-00' then 'HLAG' WHEN !@CUSTOMER IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(!@CUSTOMER) >= 3 THEN SUBSTR(!@CUSTOMER, LENGTH(!@CUSTOMER) - 2, 3) ELSE '' END

attribute.name: value
attribute.query: CASE WHEN alnvalue IS NOT NULL THEN alnvalue WHEN numvalue IS NOT NULL THEN '' || numvalue ELSE '' END

entity.name: offering
entity.whereclause: (offering.classificationid is null or offering.classificationid not like '8151%') and (offering.TEMPLATEID like 'HLCDEO%')

entity.name: SR
entity.whereclause: ((sr.classificationid is null or sr.classificationid not like '8151%') and (SR.TEMPLATEID is null or (SR.TEMPLATEID not in ('HLCDECHG','HLCDECHTUI','HLCDECHSSO') and SR.TEMPLATEID not like 'HLCDEO%' )))

entity.name: srforchange
entity.whereclause: (srforchange.classificationid is null or srforchange.classificationid not like '8151%')

attribute.name: inouttime
attribute.query: CASE WHEN !@internalpriority=1 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) <=2 THEN 'INTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=1 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) >2 THEN 'OUTTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=2 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) <=4 THEN 'INTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=2 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) >4 THEN 'OUTTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=3 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) <=6 THEN 'INTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=3 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) >6 THEN 'OUTTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=4 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) <=8 THEN 'INTIME' WHEN !@internalpriority=4 AND INT((CURRENT TIMESTAMP-!@REPORTDATE)/10000) >8 THEN 'OUTTIME' END

attribute.name: closeddate
attribute.query: CASE WHEN !@status = 'CLOSED' then !@statusdate ELSE null END

attribute.name: noid
attribute.query: case when (!@parent is not null) then !@parent else '' end || ' ' || !@assetnum

attribute.name: computername
attribute.query: CASE WHEN LOCATE('//',!@Description) > 0 THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTR(!@Description,1,LOCATE('//',!@Description)-1))) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(!@Description)) END

attribute.name: upper_computername
attribute.query: CASE WHEN LOCATE('//',!@Description) > 0 THEN UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTR(!@Description,1,LOCATE('//',!@Description)-1)))) ELSE UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(!@Description))) END

attribute.name: hlagdescription
attribute.query: CASE WHEN LOCATE('//',!@Description) > 0 THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTR(!@Description, LOCATE('//', !@Description)+3))) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(!@Description)) END

attribute.name: hlagdescription2
attribute.query: '('||!@assetnum ||') ' || !@Description || case when !@serialnum is null then '' else ' // ' || !@serialnum end

attribute.name: hlagswd
attribute.query: CASE WHEN assetloccommswd_.commodity = 'HLC-0007' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

attribute.name: hlagscanclient
attribute.query: CASE WHEN assetloccommscanclient_.commodity = 'HLC-0006' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

attribute.name: floor
attribute.query: CASE WHEN (!@description is not null and LOCATE('/FL:',!@description) > 0 ) then SUBSTR(!@description,LOCATE('/FL:',!@description)+4,(LOCATE('/',REPLACE(!@description,'/FL:','')) - LOCATE('/',!@description) )) else '' end

attribute.name: room
attribute.query: CASE WHEN (!@description is not null and LOCATE('RO:',!@description) > 0 ) then SUBSTR(!@description,LOCATE('RO:',!@description)+3,(LOCATE('/',!@description) - LOCATE('RO:',!@description)-3 )) else '' end

attribute.name: service
attribute.query: SUBSTR(classstructure_.description, LOCATE('\', classstructure_.description) + 1)

attribute.name: hlagsummary
attribute.query: CASE WHEN LOCATE('//',!@Description) > 0 THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTR(!@Description,1,LOCATE('//',!@Description)-1))) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(!@Description)) END

attribute.name: hlagimacstatus
attribute.query: case when (select count(*) from maximo.WOACTIVITY wo where wo.origrecordid = !@ticketid and wo.origrecordclass = 'SR') > 0 and (!@status != 'CANCELLED' and !@status != 'CLOSED' and !@status != 'RESOLVED' ) then !@status || ' ' || (select case when count(*) = 0 then '1' else count(*) end from maximo.WOACTIVITY wo where wo.origrecordid = !@ticketid and wo.status in ('CAN','CLOSED','COMP') and wo.origrecordclass = 'SR') || '/' || (select count(*) from maximo.WOACTIVITY wo where wo.origrecordid = !@ticketid and wo.origrecordclass = 'SR') else !@status end

attribute.name: hlagservice
attribute.query: case when !@classificationid = '81515000' then 'Install' when !@classificationid = '81515100' then 'Move' when !@classificationid = '81515300' then 'Update Asset Data' when !@classificationid = '81515200' then 'Add Subcomponent' when !@classificationid = '81515400' then 'Remove' when !@classificationid = '81515500' then 'Replace' when !@classificationid = '81515700' then 'Decommission' end

attribute.name: displaycostcenter
attribute.query: COALESCE(glcomp02,'') || ' // ' || COALESCE(accountname,'')

attribute.name: hlagcostcenter
attribute.query: CASE WHEN LOCATE('/',description) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(description, LOCATE('/',description)-4, LENGTH(description) - LOCATE('/',description) + 5) ELSE '' END

attribute.name: regiongroupdefault
attribute.query: (select region.groupdefault from maximo.persongroupview region inner join maximo.persongroup regionpg on region.persongroup = regionpg.persongroup where region.personid = persongroupview.personid and REPLACE(regionpg.description,' ','') = SUBSTR(persongroup_.description,1,LOCATE('-',persongroup_.description,LOCATE('-',persongroup_.description)+1)-1))

attribute.name: areagroupdefault
attribute.query: (select area.groupdefault from maximo.persongroupview area inner join maximo.persongroup areapg on area.persongroup = areapg.persongroup where area.personid = persongroupview.personid and REPLACE(areapg.description,' ','') = SUBSTR(persongroup_.description,1,LOCATE('-',persongroup_.description)-1))

attribute.name: costcenterdescription
attribute.query: (select cc.accountname from maximo.chartofaccounts cc where cc.glcomp02 = SUBSTR(persongroup_.description,LOCATE('/',persongroup_.description) - 4))

attribute.name: locationcostcenterdescription
attribute.query: (select cc.accountname from maximo.chartofaccounts cc where cc.glcomp02 = SUBSTR(locationpersongroup_.description,LOCATE('/',locationpersongroup_.description) - 4))

attribute.name: hlagchangeticketid
attribute.query: CASE WHEN sr_.ticketid IS NOT NULL THEN sr_.ticketid ELSE relatedsr_.relatedreckey END

attribute.name: hlagsrid
attribute.query: CASE WHEN !@ORIGRECORDCLASS IS NOT NULL AND !@ORIGRECORDCLASS = 'SR' THEN !@ORIGRECORDID ELSE '' END

relationshipAttribute.query: !@assignstatus in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='WFASGNSTATUS' and maxvalue='ACTIVE')

field.label: Gewnschter Produktionstermin
field.tooltip: Tragen Sie hier den gewnschten Produktionsstart des Systems ein. Bitte beachten Sie dass fr den Aufbau 3 Werktage bentigt werden.

field.label: Geplantes Produktionsende
field.tooltip: Sofern der Server nur temporr betrieben werden soll knnen Sie hier bereits das Produktionsende festlegen.

optionfield.label: Betriebsart / LPAR-Typ
optionfield.tooltip: Whlen Sie hier, ob es sich um ein produktives System (7x24 oder 5x12) oder ein Testsystem (5x12) handelt.

optionfield.label: CPU
optionfield.tooltip: Whlen Sie hier die gewnschte Anzahl vCPUs aus.

optionfield.label: Memory
optionfield.tooltip: Wie viel Speicherplatz wird voraussichtlich fr Applikationen auf Partition C bentigt werden?Standardgre fr Disk C ist: XXX GB. Der hier angegebenen Speicher wird zustzlich dazu bereitgestellt.

field.label: Host Name
field.tooltip: Tragen Sie hier den gewnschten Names fr den Server KFDC**** ein (ohne KFDC). Hierfr stehen Ihnen 4 Zeichen zur Verfgung. Die ersten beiden sollte Buchstaben sein welche den Zweck des Servers beschreiben (Beispielsweise LY fr Lync, BI fr Business Intelligence etc.) darauf sollten 2 Zahlen folgen.

optionfield.label: K-Fall Kategorie
optionfield.tooltip: Falls es sich um ein Produktivsystem handelt (Betriebsart / LPAR-Typ: Produktion) whlen Sie hier eine K-Fall Kategorie aus.

optionfield.label: Soll der Server aus dem Internet erreichbar sein?

field.label: Weitere Anmerkungen:
field.tooltip: Platz fr zustzliche Angaben / Wnsche.Bitte beachten Sie: Sonderwnsche sind nicht Teil des Factory-Ansatzen und knnen mglicherweise nicht im vereinarten Zeitraum umgesetzt werden.

field.label: Information: Folgende Leistungen sind im Factory-Ansatz enthalten:
Disk Size fr Applikationen (zustzlich zur Grundinstallation auf Partition C)
field.tooltip: Bitte definieren Sie die gewnschte Gre der Partition E

field.label: Disk (E:)
field.tooltip: Bitte definieren Sie die gewnschte Gre der Partition E

optionfield.label: OS
optionfield.tooltip: Whlen Sie hier das gewnschte Betriebssystem.

optionfield.label: IIS
optionfield.tooltip: Whlen Sie hier ob die Microsoft IIS Serverrolle installiert werden soll.

field.label: Disk Size fr Applikationen (zustzlich zur Grundinstallation)
field.tooltip: Bitte definieren Sie wie viel Disk Size Sie zustzlich zur Grundinstallation bentigen.

optionfield.label: OS
optionfield.tooltip: Whlen Sie hier das gewnschte Betriebssystem.

option.label: Login Problem (server offline or password problem)
A mailbox or folder of a colleague, that you have mapped to your outlook directory
option.value: A mailbox or folder of a colleague, that you have mapped to your outlook directory

option.label: A group mailbox, that you are directly logged on to (using the team mailbox ID and PWD)
option.value: A group mailbox, that you are directly logged on to (using the team mailbox ID and PWD)

option.label: A group mailbox, that you have mapped to your personal outlook directory
option.value: A group mailbox, that you have mapped to your personal outlook directory

option.label: A public folder (please also tell us the path to the folder)
option.value: A public folder (please also tell us the path to the folder)

option.label: You get countless mail from a single user/mail address
option.value: You get countless mail from a single user/mail address

field.label: Do you face slow response? If yes, please define which applications:
In case of Internet issues answer the following:
Is the internet access slow or down? (time loading specific URL)

optionfield.label: Does the problem affect a single internet page or all pages?

field.label: Used proxy ('ping proxy' on the user\'s PC will show this):
Do you receive any error messages? If so please provide an example:
One or more clients do not have connection to the network:

optionfield.label: Do the clients have an IP address?

optionfield.label: Are you getting the authorisation page?

Please enter detailed Sub-Component information in the Remarks box.

header.label: If more than one child asset is selected and status or destination are different, please use remark field for detailed explanations.
If more than one child asset is selected and status or destination are different, please use remark field for detailed explanations.

header.label: Please attach a disposal/resale certificate to prove that the disposal/resale has been performend in terms of HL ITC Guide paragraph "Hardware Sale and Disposal".
